options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many datapoints for a goal
options.action: Get many datapoints for a goal

options.name: Uncle
options.description: Derail a goal and charge the pledge amount
options.action: Derail a goal and charge the pledge amount

properties.name: goalName
properties.description: The name of the goal. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: goalName
properties.description: The name of the goal to derail. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: goalName
properties.description: The name of the goal. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: datapoints
properties.description: Array of datapoint objects to create. Each object should contain value and optionally timestamp, comment, etc.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Defaults to "now" if none is passed in, or the existing timestamp if the datapoint is being updated rather than created

options.name: timestamp
options.description: Defaults to "now" if none is passed in, or the existing timestamp if the datapoint is being updated rather than created

options.name: requestid
options.description: String to uniquely identify a datapoint

options.name: dryrun
options.description: Whether to test charge creation without actually charging

options.name: dryrun
options.description: Whether to test the endpoint without actually creating a goal

options.name: tags
options.description: Array of alphanumeric tags for the goal. Replaces existing tags.

options.name: yaxis
options.description: Y-axis label for the goal graph

options.name: tmin
options.description: Minimum date for the goal in format yyyy-mm-dd

options.name: tmax
options.description: Maximum date for the goal in format yyyy-mm-dd

options.name: roadall
options.description: Array of arrays defining the bright red line. Each sub-array contains [date, value, rate] with exactly one field null.

options.name: datasource
options.description: Data source for the goal. Use empty string for manual entry.

options.name: tags
options.description: Array of alphanumeric tags for the goal. Replaces existing tags.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Whether to include datapoints in the response

options.name: datapoints
options.description: Whether to include datapoints in the response

options.name: emaciated
options.description: Whether to include the goal attributes called road, roadall, and fullroad will be stripped from the goal object

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Whether to include associations in the response

options.name: associations
options.description: Whether to include associations in the response

options.name: diff_since
options.description: Only goals and datapoints that have been created or updated since the timestamp will be returned

options.name: skinny
options.description: Whether to return minimal user data

options.name: emaciated
options.description: Whether to include the goal attributes called road, roadall, and fullroad will be stripped from any goal objects returned with the user

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Whether to include the goal attributes called road, roadall, and fullroad will be stripped from the goal objects

options.name: emaciated
options.description: Whether to include the goal attributes called road, roadall, and fullroad will be stripped from the goal objects

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Whether to include the goal attributes called road, roadall, and fullroad will be stripped from the goal objects

options.name: emaciated
options.description: Whether to include the goal attributes called road, roadall, and fullroad will be stripped from the goal objects

options.name: page
options.description: Used to paginate results, 1-indexed, meaning page 1 is the first page

options.name: per
options.description: Number of results per page. Default 25. Ignored without page parameter. Must be non-negative

options.name: timestamp
options.description: Defaults to "now" if none is passed in, or the existing timestamp if the datapoint is being updated rather than created

subProperties.name: emaciated
subProperties.description: Whether to include the goal attributes called road, roadall, and fullroad will be stripped from the goal objects

subProperties.name: timestamp
subProperties.description: Defaults to "now" if none is passed in, or the existing timestamp if the datapoint is being updated rather than created

subProperties.name: page

subProperties.name: per

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
